content: a simple crocheted baby cardigan for all occasions so sweet and lovely for both boys and girls and easy to make the pattern has step by step pictures to show you how to crochet the baby cardigan and will make it an easy pattern for beginners as well as advanced crocheters this pattern is part of my collection of basic crocheted baby clothes materials yarn approx 100-150 gr llama soft balls 50gr 150m/164yards you could check yarnsub for an yarn that s easier for you to get your hands on hook 4 0mm 3-5 snap buttons scissors needle sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-9 months gauge 16 double_crochet x 9 row = 10x10cm 4 x4
